TopicTitle: What Happens When You Exceed Active Kerbal Limit?

Articles.Content:
What happens when I rescue more Kerbals than my astronaut complex is rated to hold? I'm at my max of 12, and I have three or four rescue contracts underway... Do I get to keep them if I bring them down, or must I upgrade my facility to keep them? I don't want to lose valuable engineers/scientists this way.

-Khorso

Edited November 17, 2016 by Khorso
Nothing happens. You just get freebie Kerbals.
It means that you will not be allowed to spend exorbitant amounts of money to hire more of them until you upgrade the AC. So the only negative effect is a hiring ban.
